page.title: 16MY WORRIES- by today's child
page.content: It is a pity that you go to football matches these days scared of the violence there could be after it. {(boy,9years)} What frightens me is all the kidnapping of children. It isn't very nice to switch on the television and find that another child has been kidnapped or been found murdered. {(girl,9years)} I worry about nuclear missiles and what would happen if one of them was fired. {(boy,10years) I worry about schools being broken into at the weekends.{(girl,10years) I'm worried about vandalism which older people do just to act big. { (girl,9years) I worry about strangers. I always run when I am told to go and get my little brother from another house. { (girl,9years)
